# E-Commerce Platform MVP

## Project Overview
We need to build a minimal viable product (MVP) for an e-commerce platform that allows users to browse products, add them to cart, and complete purchases. The platform should support both buyers and sellers.

## Core Requirements

### 1. User Management
- User registration with email verification
- Login/logout functionality with JWT authentication
- Password reset via email
- User profile management
- Role-based access control (buyer/seller/admin)

### 2. Product Management
- Product catalog with categories
- Product search and filtering
- Product details page with images
- Inventory management for sellers
- Product reviews and ratings

### 3. Shopping Cart
- Add/remove items from cart
- Update quantities
- Save cart for logged-in users
- Guest checkout support

### 4. Order Processing
- Secure checkout process
- Multiple payment methods (credit card, PayPal)
- Order confirmation emails
- Order history and tracking
- Invoice generation

### 5. Seller Dashboard
- Product listing management
- Order management
- Sales analytics
- Revenue reports

## Technical Requirements
- RESTful API backend
- React frontend
- PostgreSQL database
- Redis for caching
- AWS S3 for image storage
- Stripe for payment processing
- SendGrid for emails

## Non-Functional Requirements
- Mobile-responsive design
- Page load time < 3 seconds
- 99.9% uptime
- GDPR compliance
- SSL encryption
- Automated testing with >80% coverage

## MVP Timeline
The MVP should be completed within 12 weeks with the following milestones:
- Week 1-2: Project setup and authentication
- Week 3-4: Product management
- Week 5-6: Shopping cart
- Week 7-8: Order processing
- Week 9-10: Seller dashboard
- Week 11-12: Testing and deployment
